<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Do not set caller access for script includes in HR Service Portal plugin that get upgraded and are accessible from all scopes</description>
        <name>HR SP - fix caller access on upgrade</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var property = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
property.addQuery('name', 'sn_hr_core.rca');
property.query();
if (property.next() && property.value == 'true')
	gs.info('Keep caller access to restrict for HR SP script includes');
else {
	gs.info('Do not set caller access for upgraded HR SP script includes');
	fixCallerAccess();
}

function fixCallerAccess() {
	var scripts = [
		"hr_PortalContent",
		"emailUtil",
		"hr_PortalUtil",
		"hr_TaskTicket"
	];
	
	for (var i = 0; i < scripts.length; i++) {
		var scriptGr = new GlideRecord('sys_script_include');
		scriptGr.addQuery('api_name', 'sn_hr_sp.' + scripts[i]);
		scriptGr.query();
		while (scriptGr.next()) {
			scriptGr.caller_access = "";
			scriptGr.update();
		}
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
